title: About Us
description: Elite Commercial Door, Inc. is a state licensed & insured premier company for all of your automatic or manual commercial door needs.

location_card.title: South Florida
location_card.description: Based in South Florida, we can service any of the Tri-County areas (Palm Beach, Broward or Miami-Dade) in short notice.

business_card.title: 18 Years
business_card.description: We are a family owned business with over 18 years in the commercial door industry

service_card.title: Service & Installation
service_card.description: We can service and install Automatic Door assemblies, Manual steel door assemblies, Storefront assemblies and all respective hardware.
